attributes.action: Honour a woman who more than deserves to be, Susan Jane Evelyn Doughty.
attributes.additional_details:
Here is a woman who has dedicated nearly 20 years of her life to mental health by forming and self funding a charity, long before the area had the exposure it has now.

If the statistic are to be believed, that 1 in 7 people attempt the unthinkable if they don't get access to counselling when they need it, then a claim that this woman has helped save hundreds of lives is not an unreasonable suggestion.
attributes.background: Discuss a points based system for public honours, with clear guidance on how they are accumulated.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours

If you'd like to see a change to how the honours system works, you could start a petition setting out what changes you'd like to see.
